text: seonjijayeo! geudaedeul-i anaedeulgwa ihonhagoja hal ttaeneun geunyeodeul-ui suglyeo gigan-eul golyeohayeo ihonhago suglyeo gigan-eul gyesanhala. geudaedeul junim-eul dulyeowohala. geunyeodeul-i hwagsilhi chuaghan il-eul beomhaji anh-eun isang geudaedeul-eun geunyeodeul-ui jib-eseo geunyeodeul-eul jjoch-anaeji malmyeo geunyeodeuldo (jib-eseo) nagaji anhnola. igeos-eun hananim-ui gyeong-gyeini hananim-ui gyeong-gyeleul neomneun janeun jinsillo jasin-eul budanghi dalun geos-ila. geudaeneun moleuni, hananimkkeseo geu hue eotteohan il-eul mandeusil sudo issnola
